授業方法:
this course will be held face-to-face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format if needed

< For students permitted to take classes online > - On-demand videos will be recorded and uploaded via Google Classroom. Students need to check LUNA for more details on accessing Google Classroom

This course will require students to read about a variety of topics in English, which will hopefully be of interest to them and encourage them to enjoy reading in English more. Students will also be required to take part in pair and group discussions to discuss what the text meant and their ideas related to it.

In addition to the textbook, other supplementary materials will be used related to the topics and students will be expected to choose and read books that interest them outside of class as homework. There will be a focus on vocabulary building with possible vocabulary quizzes. The instructor will help students develop reading strategies that will increase their comprehension ability, which will help them during the mid-term and final tests
